description: Metadata for corpus items fetched via HTTP.

$schema.description: URI of this JSON schema document.

http_headers.description: HTTP headers from host web site.  The keys and values are always encoded with python v2.7.2 String.encode('string-escape') (generated by fetcher)

redirect_chain.description: Array of HTTP headers from the sequence of HTTP redirects that occurred while fetching the content.  While redirects are normal and occur often, the presence of redirects carries a higher probability that the fetcher hit a 'pay wall' instead of obtaining the intended content. (generated by fetcher)
